EmailTemplate.name: Ownership100%
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity has been marked 100% Ownership. Please validate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear #UserName,
Opportunity Name: #OpportunityName Opportunity Stage: #OpportunityStageName Account Name: #AccName
The opportunity captioned above has been signed and marked as 100% Ownership. Please review and validate if the opportunity was won 100% from ownership by accessing the tab: "Ownership Validation"
Ryder Team
